author: elecharny
msg: Increased the build number to launch a new build

author: elecharny
msg: Moved Attribute(s)Srializer to jdbm-store and shared-ldap projects
Fixed the tests accordingly to the JdbmTable modification

author: elecharny
msg: Moved the Attribute(s)Serializer down to this project, to avoid cyclic dependencies.
Modified the JdbmMasterTable to pass a keySerializer and a valueSerializer to the modified JdbmTRable constructor
Modified JdbmTable to take two new arguments (which can be null) : a keySerializer and a valueSerializer.
If the serializer is null, jdbm will use the default one (java serialization default method)
Did the same with JdbmIndex, which creates BTrees too

author: aconway
msg: Otherwise we get a race: closing a channel can wake a client thread,
which may see client.closed as still false. Was causing bogus exceptions

author: handyande
msg: Archiva is now up on the latest container avec role hints etc
